title: Proceedings regarding trustee's power to adjust
context: [ยง557A-106] Proceedings regarding trustee&rsquo;s power to adjust. In a proceeding with respect to a trustee&rsquo;s exercise or nonexercise of the power to make an adjustment under section 557A-104, the sole remedy shall be to direct, deny, or revise an adjustment between principal and income. [L 2000, c 191, pt of ยง1]
